entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is mentioned as speaking to Severus Snape. She asks him to watch over her son Draco and protect him from harm.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is asked by Narcissa to watch over her son Draco and carry out a deed if necessary.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as the son of Narcissa who needs to be watched over and protected.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix watches Narcissa and Severus Snape with her wand on their clasped hands.

relationships.description: Narcissa asks Severus Snape to watch over her son Draco.
Narcissa is the mother of Draco.
Severus Snape agrees to watch over Draco.
Narcissa interacts with Bellatrix while asking Severus Snape for help.
Bellatrix watches Narcissa and Severus Snape.
